TITLE: Police: Plane circling Mississippi city threatens to crash
SUMMARY: Police say the pilot of a small airplane has been circling over Tupelo and other parts of northeast Mississippi and had threatened to crash the aircraft into a Walmart store

TITLE: 17 states weigh adopting California's electric car mandate
SUMMARY: Seventeen states that tie their vehicle emission standards to rules established in California must decide whether to follow that state’s strict new rules

TITLE: Border Patrol: 9 migrants found dead in Rio Grande at Texas
SUMMARY: Officials say at least nine migrants died when dozens attempted a hazardous crossing of the Rio Grande river near Eagle Pass, Texas

TITLE: Police in Mississippi say pilot threatening to crash plane into a local Walmart; store evacuated
SUMMARY: Police in Mississippi say pilot threatening to crash plane into a local Walmart; store evacuated

TITLE: Who gets to tell the story of a historic civil rights site?
SUMMARY: A fight is brewing in Tennessee over a legendary civil rights and labor organizing center whose alumni and supporters include Rosa Parks and Eleanor Roosevelt

TITLE: Governor says plane that threatened to crash into store in Mississippi has landed safely
SUMMARY: Governor says plane that threatened to crash into store in Mississippi has landed safely

TITLE: Man dies in shootout with Milwaukee police; bystander hurt
SUMMARY: Police say a man was killed by Milwaukee officers after he led them on a chase into a busy downtown bar district, then got out of his vehicle and opened fire on them

TITLE: $50K reward for information on abducted Memphis jogger
SUMMARY: The family of a Tennessee woman who police said was abducted and forced into a vehicle while she was jogging near the University of Memphis campus has offered a $50,000 reward for information in the case

TITLE: Reeves: Plane threatening to crash in Mississippi lands
SUMMARY: Authorities say a plane that was circling over northern Mississippi and whose pilot had threatened to crash it into the ground has landed safely

TITLE: California wildfire destroys 100 homes, other buildings
SUMMARY: About 100 homes and other structures have been destroyed in a Northern California wildfire that put thousands under evacuation orders

TITLE: Man who flew plane over Mississippi faces criminal charges
SUMMARY: Authorities say a man who stole a plane and flew it over Mississippi after threatening to crash it into a Walmart store faces charges of grand larceny and terroristic threats

TITLE: Man who flew plane over Mississippi didn't have pilot's license; faces grand larceny, terrorist threats charges
SUMMARY: Man who flew plane over Mississippi didn't have pilot's license; faces grand larceny, terrorist threats charges

TITLE: Border patrol: 9 migrants die crossing swift Texas river
SUMMARY: Officials on both sides of the U.S.-Mexico border are searching for more victims after at least nine migrants died while attempting a hazardous crossing of the rain-swollen Rio Grande river near Eagle Pass, Texas

TITLE: Authorities: Pilot who threatened to crash plane into Mississippi store has been taken into police custody
SUMMARY: Authorities: Pilot who threatened to crash plane into Mississippi store has been taken into police custody
